title: Sedan
description: This is a sedan car with a comfortable interior and smooth ride. It's perfect for daily commuting.

title: SUV
description: Experience adventure with our SUV. It's spacious, powerful, and designed for off-road trips.

title: Sports Car
description: Feel the thrill of speed with our sports car. It's sleek, aerodynamic, and built for performance.

title: Truck
description: Get the job done with our durable and rugged truck. It's built to handle heavy loads and tough tasks.

title: Electric Car
description: Go green with our electric car. It's eco-friendly, efficient, and comes with advanced technology.

title: Convertible
description: Experience the open road with our convertible car. It's perfect for sunny days and leisurely drives.
